news.title: AI spending is boosting the economy, but many businesses are in survival mode
news.summary: As AI lifts the economy and stock market, businesses are struggling. Retail, travel and construction are struggling with high costs and a downbeat consumer.

news.title: Warren Buffett Watch: Berkshire is lagging the S&P 500 by the largest gap so far this year
news.summary: Shares of Warren Buffett's company are underperforming the benchmark index by almost 7%. The shares of Berkshire Hathaway are down almost 7% this year. The shares are down nearly 7% since the start of 2014.

news.title: Trump blasts 'dirty play' by Ontario in waiting to pause Reagan trade ad after World Series
news.summary: Ontario has been running a TV ad featuring Ronald Reagan criticizing tariffs. That led President Trump to terminate trade talks with Canada. The ad features Reagan saying, "I'm not going to let my country be taken advantage of by other countries"

news.title: Inflation rate hit 3.0% in September, lower than expected, long-awaited CPI report shows
news.summary: The annual inflation rate as measured by the CPI was expected to be 3.1% in September, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

news.title: Inside Wealth: One in three Manhattan condo owners lost money when they sold in the last year
news.summary: Manhattan is still among the most expensive markets in the country, especially on a per-square-foot basis. The city is home to some of the world's most expensive real estate.

news.title: ‘We don’t want to get into trouble’: Can we give our daughter a $30K wedding gift without involving the IRS?
news.summary: “What is the best way to go about this?” he asks. “What are the best ways to get people to talk to each other?’”

news.title: There’s a war on the bachelor’s degree. Can anything replace it?
news.summary: The share of Americans with a bachelor's degree has been going up for years. That's about to change, if politicians get their way.

news.title: Tesla just shared more about its AI vision. These are the 3 biggest takeaways.
news.summary: Tesla used its earnings call to further hammer a future centered on AI. A lot is happening with Tesla’s automotive and energy businesses.

news.title: These five tech stocks could let you play earnings season like a pro
news.summary: We surveyed experts on their favored picks heading into earnings season. We identified companies across the tech sector. We also asked experts for their favorite tech companies to watch.

news.title: Trump’s new White House ballroom will actually cost taxpayers up to $110 million
news.summary: The refurbishment of the White House, to include the greatest ballroom ever, will supposedly have “zero cost” to us taxpayers.
